content: --पुत्रः, --सुतः {1} a daughter's son who by agreement becomes the son of her father; see <ls>Ms. 9. 127.</ls> {2} a daughter who, being regarded as a son, returns to her father's house; (पुत्रिकैव पुत्रः; अथवा पुत्रिकैव सुतः पुत्रिकासुतः सोऽप्यौरससम एव <ls>Mit.</ls> on <ls>Y. 2. 128</ls>). {3} a grandson
